alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 17 at 7:27PM MST until January 18 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Central Highlands, and Guadalupe County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways including portions of I-25. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow may reduce visibility across the high peaks.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
